zh.name: 应用商店 SEO (ASO)
zh.desc: 优化移动端应用在 App Store 和 Google Play 的排名。
zh.full_desc: 想让你的 App 获得更多下载？该技能教你如何优化关键词、标题、副标题以及屏幕截图文案，利用搜索排名机制（SEO）提升 App 的可见度，降低获客成本，让更多用户主动找到你的应用。

en.name: App Store Optimization (ASO)
en.desc: Optimize mobile app rankings in App Store and Google Play.
en.full_desc: Want more downloads for your App? This skill teaches you how to optimize keywords, titles, subtitles, and screenshot copy to leverage store search algorithms (ASO) for better visibility and lower user acquisition costs.
